dct_title_s: A general map of the northern British colonies in America, which comprehends the province of Quebec, the government of Newfoundland, Nova-Scotia, New-England and New-York
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Title in upper margin: The seat of war, in the northern colonies, containing the province of Quebec, Newfoundland, Nova-Scotia, New-England, New-York, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, & ca. Cartouche includes realistic rendering of beaver. From the author's The American military pocket atlas [1776].
dct_publisher_sm: London, Printed for Robt. Sayer & Jno. Bennett, map & sea chartsellers, 1776.
